meanings.definition: Entropions: a condition in which the eyelid turns inward
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with entropions after noticing the eyelid turning inward.
meanings.sent2: Entropions can cause discomfort and irritation due to the eyelid's inward rotation.
meanings.sent3: When the entropions made the eyelid turn inward, it looked like a secret wink.
meanings.sent4: Her entropions created a mysterious allure, as if hiding a hidden message behind her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The entropions made the eyelid curl inwards, like a shy turtle retracting into its shell.
